short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Posts, Comments, Followers, and more from Instagram, with options to export in formats such as CSV, Excel, JSON, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instagram Data Extractor & Downloader - Export Instagram Data to CSV/Excel/JSON

Overview:
This powerful Instagram data extraction tool enables you to automatically download and convert Instagram posts, comments, profiles, followers, following lists, stories, reels, and explore feed data into multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Our scraper extracts detailed information from Instagram profiles and feeds, making it the perfect tool for marketers, researchers, data analysts, social media managers, and developers.

Key Features:
✓ Extract complete Instagram profiles and their content
✓ Export to multiple formats: CSV, Excel (XLSX), JSON, XML
✓ Automatic pagination and data collection
✓ Comprehensive data extraction from stories and reels
✓ Advanced follower and following list extraction

What Data You Can Extract:
• Profile Data
- User information
- Profile statistics
- Bio and contact details

• Content
- Posts and captions
- Stories
- Reels
- Tagged posts
- Saved posts
- Comments and engagement metrics

• Network Data
- Followers list
- Following list
- Engagement rates

Perfect For:
Market Research: Analyze trends and user engagement patterns
Competitor Analysis: Track and compare competitor profiles and content performance
Influencer Marketing: Evaluate potential partnerships through detailed analytics
Content Strategy: Download and analyze successful content formats

Export Format Support:
• CSV - Perfect for spreadsheet analysis
• Excel (XLSX) - Formatted with proper data types
• JSON - Ideal for developers
• HTML Table - Easy to read and analyze
• XML - Structured data export
• TXT - Plain text format
• Raw JSON - Complete data access

Supported Countries/Sites:
Worldwide access to Instagram data

Known Limitations:
• Rate limits apply for non-Premium users
• Requires user authentication

Technical Support:
Need assistance? Contact us: hello@nifty.codes

Privacy & Security:
Your login credentials are required to use this extension but are kept strictly confidential and never disclosed to third parties.
Exported data is formatted on our servers and never stored.
